name: CardiacSurgeryOtherThanCABGICD9
title: Cardiac Surgery Other Than CABG ICD9
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a cardiac surgery procedure other than a CABG.  These procedures include surgery on heart valves or congenital heart defects.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a cardiac surgical procedure other than a CABG.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent a cardiac surgical procedure other than a CABG.  Codes used are to be ICD9CM codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.   Exclude codes that represent a cardiac procedure performed using a scope.)
